REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F Y f1618 reute r f BC-ALTEX-<AII>-TO-SELL-O 04-21 0072

TEXT.TITLE: ALTEX <AII> TO SELL OILFIELD SERVICES ASSETS
TEXT.BODY: Altex Industries Inc said it agreed to sell the assets of its wholly-owned oilfield service subsidiary, Parrish Oil Tools Inc. The price and buyer were not disclosed. Altex said Parrish had a loss from operations of 428,000 dlrs on revenues of 881,000 dlrs in fiscal 1986 and a loss from operations of 48,000 dlrs on revenues of two mln dlrs in fiscal 1985. Reuter
